item.title: ACID
item.description: Data # DROP TABLE IF EXISTS IsolationTests; CREATE TABLE IsolationTests ( Col1 INT, Col2 INT, Col3 INT ); INSERT INTO IsolationTests(Col1,Col2,Col3) SELECT 1,2,3 UNION ALL SELECT 1,2,3 UNION ALL SELECT 1,2,3 UNION ALL SELECT 1,2,3 UNION ALL SELECT 1,2,3 UNION ALL SELECT 1,2,3 UNION ALL SELECT 1,2,3 ; Read Uncommitted # -- T1 - T2 SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED; SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED; BEGIN; BEGIN; UPDATE IsolationTests SET Col1 = 2; -- Dirty Read.

item.title: Client
item.description: find out the latest deadlocks show engine innodb status; show transactions select trx_id, trx_state, trx_mysql_thread_id, trx_query from information_schema.innodb_trx; show processeslist SHOW FULL PROCESSLIST; kill processes kill <mysql_thread_id>; get&set variables show variables like "max_connections"; set global max_connections = 200;
